I'm not a heavy uploader but since this is my favourite tv show of all times I feel I have to help all you other Gold Rush junkies out there get your saturday night dose!
yea thanks a lot man I just can't stand commercials so I download thanks for your hard work

I keep wondering how much of the show is scripted and staged. Coming back from Jungle Gold's Behind The Scenes episode, it seems like a big part of it is actually real.

Some parts are probably fabricated though, like when in Quartz Creek the Truck supposedly could not cross a bridge, i think they just added that problem for dramatic reasons.

Thank you buddy for your effort.
Here in Portugal takes so long to show new episodes, and this version has a great quality!

They need to add some dramatic components to the show, so they can creat some expectations from the viewers... but I believe that the actual goal from the guys, the gold richness, is real...
